Reference

Exported Functions

Processing functions available for the user

pr_convert()

Extract data from a PRISMA he5 file and convert to GTiff or ENVI

pr_extract_spectra()

Extract values and statistics from a PRISMA hyperspectral cube converted with pr_convert

pr_compute_indexes()

Compute spectral indexes from a PRISMA he5 file (or a file converted with pr_convert)

pr_listindexes()

Print a list of available spectral indexes

pr_addindex()

add a spectral index to the list of available ones
